idea:
Spare8 Platforms Private Limited is a Web-technologies driven Company which through Web-Technologies, Internet, web based and web enabled services and applications, undertakes the business of distribution, solicitation, procurement and sales of Financial products including but not limited to mutual funds, shares, stocks, gold, deposits, commercial papers, debentures, bonds, insurance and other securities issued or guaranteed by any company, firm, body corporate, Central or State Government or any other authority in India or outside as agent, broker, sub-broker, third party administrator, consultant or advisors to clients.

Our Company also undertakes business of development, distribution, sale, providing consultancy, and deal in all kinds of Information Technology Solutions and services for procurement, sale and Distribution of various financial products.

Our partners are Paytm and Augmont.
name: SPARE8 PLATFORMS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: House Hold Garbage Destroying Unit. Need help for fabricating more efficient and effective model which I have design. It gives Activated Carbon. I am trying to recover Nano Carbon Tubes also. We can get Carbon Credit. In this new design model activated carbon will be very high quality. By this way we don't need to collect garbage from society, segregation not required, no transportation and dumping ground required. We can make /  design it as per society requirement.
